com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class Loader<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Loader<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The backend specific resource. In general such a resource is called "sprite", "texture" or "image".
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LibGdxLoader

    public abstract class Loader<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    A loader is responsible for loading all resources. Since this library is meant to be as generic as possible, it cannot be assumed how to load a resource. Because of this this class has to be abstract. This class takes care of loading all resources a Data instance contains. To load all resources an instance relies on loadResource(FileReference) which has to implemented with the backend specific methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Data data
      The current set data containing Folders and Files.
      protected java.util.HashMap<FileReference,R> resources
      Contains all loaded resources if not isDisposed().
      protected java.lang.String root
      The root path to the previous loaded Spriter SCML file.

    • Method Detail

      • loadResource

        protected abstract R loadResource(FileReference ref)
        Loads a resource. The path to the file can be resolved with root and data. I recommend using Data.getFile(FileReference). Then the path to the resource is File.name relative to root.
        Parameters:
        ref - the reference to load
        Returns:
        the loaded resource

      • finishLoading

        protected void finishLoading()
        Called when all resources from data have been loaded.

      • beginLoading

        protected void beginLoading()
        Called before all resources get loaded.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String root)
        Loads all resources indicated by data.
        Parameters:
        root - the root folder of the previously loaded Spriter SCML file

      • load

        public void load(java.io.File file)
        Loads all resources indicated by data.
        Parameters:
        file - the previously loaded Spriter SCML file

      • get

        public R get(FileReference ref)
        Returns a resource the given reference is pointing to.
        Parameters:
        ref - the reference pointing to a resource
        Returns:
        the resource or null if the resource is not loaded yet.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes all loaded resources from the internal reference-resource map. Override this method and dispose all your resources. After that call dispose() of the super class.

      • isDisposed

        public boolean isDisposed()
        Returns whether this loader has been disposed or not.
        Returns:
        true if this loader is disposed
